name: International Conference on Smart Sustainable Materials and Technologies
content: ICSSMT 2020 is an interdisciplinary international conference on smart sustainable materials and technologies which is focused on the research works that emphasizes latest technological innovations. It showcases various material science disciplines to develop innovative approaches with a breakthrough performance in enhancing the sustainability of various advanced materials. The international conference on smart sustainable materials and technologies organized on 12-13 August, 2020 at Vaigai College of Engineering \[VEC\], Madurai, Tamil Nadu, India provides a platform for engineers, technical experts and scientists to share, exchange and contribute their innovative works and combine various sustainable technologies to develop a smart next-generation materials into existence. The main focus of this conference is to open up a new paradigm to deliberate an eco-friendly and sustainable design, optimal resource utilization and sustainable materials with low environmental impact.
